entry.title: Create Account / Log in
entry.instruction: Enter your Email to receive an authorization code

code.title: Verification
code.instruction: You will receive an email with a verification code. Enter it here to confirm your login
code.spamcheck: If you didn't receive an email, check your spam folder

trial.alreadyActivated: You have already used the trial version

activated.title: Congratulations!
activated.text: You have activated a trial plan for 3 days.

greeting.title: Welcome to your personal account!
greeting.text: We offer you to get acquainted with the service in details with the help of our guide.

paymentAwait.title: Payment Accepted
paymentAwait.text: The payment is being processed and soon (approx. 1-5 minutes) the plan will be activated. You can close this window and wait for notification

activate.text: To display {{section}} you need to activate the plan

upgrade.text: To display {{section}} you need to purchase the PRO Plan

prolong.text: To display {{section}} you need to extend your plan

trial.text: To display {{section}} you need to activate the plan

step.title: Welcome to your personal account!
step.text: We offer you to get acquainted with the service in a little more detail with the help of our guide.

step1.text: The Trading tab provides real-time information from the AI.

step2.text: We make miscalculations of several assets.

step3.text: Each asset is calculated on several timeframes.

step4.text: You see only 4 lines: forecast, fact, and the upper and lower boundaries of the channel.

step5.text: In the legend, you can enable or disable each line on the chart.

step6.text: The "Investment" tab is designed to be able to make a decision on long-term investments in assets. You can order a calculation of assets of interest.

step7.text: In the card you see the asset ticker and the forecast.

step8.text: On the PRO Trader tariff, you can order the calculation of 1 asset per month.

step9.text: In the block of recommendations for trading, you will see clear prices for entering and exiting a position, as well as the recommended risk for each transaction.

step10.text: The profile card shows your rate and the end date.

step11.text: You can also change the style of the site and subscribe to our social networks.
